episodes.title: How a Cult Took Over Fiji
episodes.description:
Thanks to Dan McGarry and the OCCRP for the support behind the scenes. And to everyone we spoke with in Fiji, thank you very much for your trust. Al Jazeera has covered the full story of Seo-Yeon Lee in this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Bn9nJ4mthKA

Thanks to @valilevi for traveling to Fiji for us. Check out his socials:
https://www.instagram.com/vali.levi/

This is the story of Grace Road, the cult that quietly took over Fiji.


Sources: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1PPqUGKGMl3vYjEpjV3_9sojIXaNxj3MmsD_rpcXdMfk/edit?usp=sharing
